item.title: Creating the Orton Effect In Capture One (without Photoshop)
Exploring Pillar Point for Bird Photography
item.description: Growing up in Half Moon Bay, I’ve spent an a lot of time near Pillar Point looking for waves because some of my favorite surf spots are in the area. More recently, I’ve been returning here not just for waves, but for photos of the incredible sea life. Pillar Point is a photographer’s paradise. It’s almost impossible to leave empty-handed, whether you’re capturing the vibrant flashes of migrating songbirds or the patient stalking of a Marsh Owl amid the reeds.
